HPI 8418 Nissan Skyline GT-R 1993 Suzuka 1000km (JGTC Round 3) 14th Place M. Kageyama/J. Krosnoff



The only race in the 1993 JGTC that the GT-R didn't win. The Suzuka 1000km was an endurance race where the Nissan R92CP and other Group C cars were dominant. Masahiko Kageyama and Jeff Krosnoff finished 14th overall and took the win in the GT-N3 class. However, this wasn't too much of an acheivment since this was the only car entered in that class.
